item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome Welcome. This space will be focusing on topics such as Automation, PowerShell, Azure, AWS, Terraform and more. YouTube Channel Currently, you can check out my YouTube channel for an introductory lab on using Terraform with Microsoft Azure. It’s geared towards beginners that may know a little about each technology but haven’t fully jumped in. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBmvsfL6OKpUBfLArIskOcA TechSnips I did some videos for TechSnips.com a few years ago, covering the following topics as well:
